text: how to roast the ultimate marshmallow
roasting marshmallows may seem simple
but there's a right way and a wrong way
here's the right way you will need a
campfire a package of medium to large
marshmallows and a roasting fork or long
wooden stick step one check the fire and
make sure it has areas that have burned
down to Embers they should be orange but
not bursting with flame sit up wind of
the fire you don't want smoke and Flame
in your face step two choose a
marshmallow and place it at the end of a
roasting fork or a long wooden stick
step three place your marshmallow
approximately 3 to 5 in above the hot
coals now slowly turn the sticks so that
the marshmallow Browns evenly on all
sides and gets warm and gooey inside
this should take about 15 to 30 seconds
if you burn a few marshmallows don't be
discouraged remember the Buddhist saying
fall down seven times get up eight step
four now now that you've perfected the
marshmallow Basics you can move on to
more Advanced Techniques these include
roasting multiple marshmallows on a
stick making a classic s'more and the
controversial Jon of Arc marshmallow
experiment soon you will become a
marshmallow Master did you know the
original marshmallow contained extracts
from the roots of the marshmallow plant
which gave it its spongy quality now
most marshmallows use gelatin
